pillars.name: Governance
pillars.description: Regulatory frameworks, policy readiness, and institutional capacity for AI oversight.

pillars.name: Citizen Empowerment
pillars.description: Public awareness, digital literacy, and citizen participation in AI governance.

pillars.name: Ethics
pillars.description: Ethical guidelines, bias mitigation, transparency, and accountability measures.

pillars.name: Economic Adaptability
pillars.description: Workforce transition readiness, reskilling infrastructure, and economic resilience.

pillars.name: Infrastructure
pillars.description: Digital infrastructure, data governance, and technical capacity.

pillars.name: Foresight
pillars.description: Future-readiness planning, scenario analysis, and adaptive policy mechanisms.
